value:
The trees here are very beautiful...
There's something mysterious about
them. I find it familiar, somehow...

You want to know more about the
world I come from? I'm sorry, but I
can't remember much.

You look so tired. Try to get some
rest soon.

Sometimes, feelings of almost
unbearable uneasiness overwhelm
me... Does that ever happen to you?

I was instructed never to associate
with others... My memory of this is
faint, but I know I was told this.

My name is Deirdre. I was entrusted
with this greeting by your friend
$Nf.

I don't know why, but...this
frightens me.

Am I of some help? That makes
me happy.
I'm a burden to you. I am sorry.

It's so kind of you to help me like
this. Thank you.

My name is Deirdre. My memories...
They're mostly gone, now. I am sorry.

So many of my memories—memories
that meant a lot to me... They're gone.$k$pI know that someone important to me
has vanished into that darkness.$k$pI...I feel uneasy. Even now, here, with
you. I worry I may never see you
again.$k$pIf I forget about you, too...please, I
beg you...$k$pCome and talk to me, and tell me all
about our time together. Bring back
the memories I've lost.
はい…
I'm sorry...
きゃああっ！
Stop...
I won't be left behind.
I'm sorry.
Something is awakening...
The darkness...
Sigurd...
cute short giggle
Try not to overdo it.
Oh, it's you!
You have my apologies. I've lost all of my memories...
It's so nice to be here with you.
Something dark slumbers in my blood.
I can't remember...who am I? Who am I?
Don't worry about me. I'm doing just fine. Being here with you brings me joy.
Yes?
What should I do?
I'll go with you.
